welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Schaafheim, a charming town in Germany known for its picturesque landscapes and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in our charming city and its hidden gems. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Frankfurt-Egelsbach Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frankfurt International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second terminal at Frankfurt International Airport, primarily serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Frankfurt International Airport, primarily used by Lufthansa and its partner airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but limited to 4 hours per device per day.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
